message:
Thanks Stephen for this wonderful post. I though have a question.  
In the final solution, you are still using Task.Run within a async. So the Mybutton_click still needs a switch to get a thread from the thread pool (for the call to Task.Run) and hands-over the operation to this new thread,right?  
Do you really need this Thread.run? Would it not solve the problem of blocking UI by just calling the calculateMandelbrot() using an await?
